page.title: 13TUXFORD problems 1
page.content:
{TUXFORD PROBLEMS by Emma Claridge
I think that the problem of Tuxford is litter. But we know that there is a man that cleans the paths and roads. The motor bikes are a problem because they come around about lO.3O p.m. when most people are asleep. Sometimes the people who ride them take the silencers off.
{TUXFORD PROBLEMS by Gary Barker
One of the problems in Tuxford is motor bikes. Very loud motor bikes, the men see how much speed they can get up on straight roads. They take their silencers out, and pull wheelies and go up and down the roads showing off on big bikes. Gilbert Avenue, Lincoln Road, and the Comprehensive car park and lots of other places are
